Bowling Bash.Name: Bowling Bash
Bowling Bash.Description: Deal 7 (10) damage for each enemy in combat.

Crush Joints.Name: Crush Joints
Crush Joints.Description: Deal 8 (10) damage. If the last card played this combat was a Skill, apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

Evaluate.Name: Evaluate
Evaluate.Description: Gain 6 (10) Block. Shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

Flurry of Blows.Name: Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage. Whenever you change Stances, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

Follow-Up.Name: Follow-Up
Follow-Up.Description: Deal 7 (11) damage. If the last card played this combat was an Attack, gain [W].

Halt.Name: Halt
Halt.Description: Gain 3 (4) Block. If you are in Wrath, gain 9 (14) additional Block.

Pressure Points.Name: Pressure Points
Pressure Points.Description: Apply 8 (11) Mark. ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.

Sash Whip.Name: Sash Whip
Sash Whip.Description: Deal 8 (10) damage. If the last card played this combat was an Attack, apply 1 (2) Weak.

Battle Hymn.Name: Battle Hymn
Battle Hymn.Description: At the start of each turn, add a Smite into your hand.
Battle Hymn.Description (Upgraded): Innate. At the start of each turn, add a Smite into your hand.

Carve Reality.Name: Carve Reality
Carve Reality.Description: Deal 6 (10) damage. Add a Smite into your hand.

Collect.Name: Collect
Collect.Description: Put a Miracle+ into your hand at the start of your next X turns. Exhaust.
Collect.Description (Upgraded): Put a Miracle+ into your hand at the start of your next X+1 turns. Exhaust.

Conclude.Name: Conclude
Conclude.Description: Deal 12 (16) damage to ALL enemies. End your turn.

Deceive Reality.Name: Deceive Reality
Deceive Reality.Description: Gain 4 (7) Block. Add a Safety into your hand.

Fasting.Name: Fasting
Fasting.Description: Gain 3 (4) Strength. Gain 3 (4) Dexterity. Gain 1 less [W] at the start of each turn.

Fear No Evil.Name: Fear No Evil
Fear No Evil.Description: Deal 8 (11) damage. If the enemy intends to Attack, enter Calm.

Foreign Influence.Name: Foreign Influence
Foreign Influence.Description: Choose 1 of 3 Attacks of any color to add into your hand. Exhaust.
Foreign Influence.Description (Upgraded): Choose 1 of 3 Attacks of any color to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

Foresight.Name: Foresight
Foresight.Description: At the start of your turn, Scry 3 (4).

Indignation.Name: Indignation
Indignation.Description: If you are in Wrath, apply 3 (5) Vulnerable to ALL enemies, otherwise enter Wrath.

Inner Peace.Name: Inner Peace
Inner Peace.Description: If you are in Calm, draw 3 (4) cards, otherwise enter Calm.

Like Water.Name: Like Water
Like Water.Description: At the end of your turn, if you are in Calm, gain 5 (7) Block.

Meditate.Name: Meditate
Meditate.Description: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand and Retain it. Enter Calm. End your turn.
Meditate.Description (Upgraded): Put 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand and Retain them. Enter Calm. End your turn.

Mental Fortress.Name: Mental Fortress
Mental Fortress.Description: Whenever you change Stances, gain 4 (6) Block.

Perseverance.Name: Perseverance
Perseverance.Description: Retain. Gain 5 (7) Block. When Retained, increase its Block by 2 (3) this combat.

Pray.Name: Pray
Pray.Description: Gain 3 (4) Mantra. Shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

Reach Heaven.Name: Reach Heaven
Reach Heaven.Description: Deal 10 (15) damage. Shuffle a Through Violence into your draw pile.

Rushdown.Name: Rushdown
Rushdown.Description: Whenever you enter Wrath, draw 2 cards.

Sanctity.Name: Sanctity
Sanctity.Description: Gain 6 (9) Block. If the last card played this combat was a Skill, draw 2 cards.

Sands of Time.Name: Sands of Time
Sands of Time.Description: Retain. Deal 20 (26) damage. When Retained, lower its cost by 1 this combat.

Signature Move.Name: Signature Move
Signature Move.Description: Can only be played if this is the only Attack in your hand. Deal 30 (40) damage.

Simmering Fury.Name: Simmering Fury
Simmering Fury.Description: At the start of your next turn, enter Wrath and draw 2 (3) cards.

Study.Name: Study
Study.Description: At the end of your turn, shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

Swivel.Name: Swivel
Swivel.Description: Gain 8 (11) Block. The next Attack you play costs 0.

Talk to the Hand.Name: Talk to the Hand
Talk to the Hand.Description: Deal 5 (7) damage. Whenever you attack this enemy, gain 2 (3) Block. Exhaust.

Tantrum.Name: Tantrum
Tantrum.Description: Deal 3 damage 3 (4) times. Enter Wrath. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

Wallop.Name: Wallop
Wallop.Description: Deal 9 (12) damage. Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

Wave of the Hand.Name: Wave of the Hand
Wave of the Hand.Description: Whenever you gain Block this turn, apply 1 (2) Weak to ALL enemies.

Weave.Name: Weave
Weave.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage. Whenever you Scry, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

Windmill Strike.Name: Windmill Strike
Windmill Strike.Description: Retain. Deal 7 (10) damage. When Retained, increase its damage by 4 (5) this combat.

Wreath of Flame.Name: Wreath of Flame
Wreath of Flame.Description: Your next Attack deals 5 (8) additional damage.

Alpha.Name: Alpha
Alpha.Description: Shuffle a Beta into your draw pile. Exhaust.
Alpha.Description (Upgraded): Innate. Shuffle a Beta into your draw pile. Exhaust.

Blasphemy.Name: Blasphemy
Blasphemy.Description: Enter Divinity. Die next turn. Exhaust.
Blasphemy.Description (Upgraded): Retain. Enter Divinity. Die next turn. Exhaust.

Brilliance.Name: Brilliance
Brilliance.Description: Deal 12 (16) damage. Deals additional damage equal to Mantra gained this combat.

Conjure Blade.Name: Conjure Blade
Conjure Blade.Description: Shuffle an Expunger into your draw pile. Exhaust.
Conjure Blade.Description (Upgraded): Shuffle an Expunger with X+1 into your draw pile. Exhaust.

Deus Ex Machina.Name: Deus Ex Machina
Deus Ex Machina.Description: Unplayable. When you draw this card, add 2 (3) Miracles to your hand and Exhaust.

Deva Form.Name: Deva Form
Deva Form.Description: Ethereal. At the start of your turn, gain [W] and increase this gain by 1.
Deva Form.Description (Upgraded): At the start of your turn, gain [W] and increase this gain by 1.

Devotion.Name: Devotion
Devotion.Description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 (3) Mantra.

Establishment.Name: Establishment
Establishment.Description: Whenever a card is Retained, reduce its cost by 1 this combat.
Establishment.Description (Upgraded): Innate. Whenever a card is Retained, reduce its cost by 1 this combat.

Judgment.Name: Judgment
Judgment.Description: If the enemy has 30 (40) or less HP, set their HP to 0.

Lesson Learned.Name: Lesson Learned
Lesson Learned.Description: Deal 10 (13) damage. If Fatal, Upgrade a random card in your deck. Exhaust.

Master Reality.Name: Master Reality
Master Reality.Description: Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it.

Omniscience.Name: Omniscience
Omniscience.Description: Choose a card in your draw pile. Play the chosen card twice and exhaust it. Exhaust.

Ragnarok.Name: Ragnarok
Ragnarok.Description: Deal 5 (6) damage to a random enemy 5 (6) times.

Scrawl.Name: Scrawl
Scrawl.Description: Draw cards until your hand is full. Exhaust.

Spirit Shield.Name: Spirit Shield
Spirit Shield.Description: Gain 3 (4) Block for each card in your hand.

Vault.Name: Vault
Vault.Description: Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn. Exhaust.

Wish.Name: Wish
Wish.Description: Choose one: Gain 6 (8) Plated Armor, 3 (4) Strength, or 25 (30) Gold. Exhaust.
